H0.text: Who became Israel's head of state in 1993. Chaim Herzog

H1.text: Who became Israel's head of state in 1993. Yitzhak Rabin

H2.text: Who became Israel's head of state in 1993. Shimon Peres

H3.text: Who became Israel's head of state in 1993. עזר ויצמן

A4.text: The president of Israel Ezer Weizman shook hands with King Hussein.

A5.text: Shimon Peres was president of Israel from 2007 to 2014.
